    Package index

    All functions

    DB_DeleteFrom()
    Delete Observations From a Table
    DB_MetaUpdate()
    Upload Metadata to the Database
    DB_Table()
    Get a Table from the Database
    DB_UploadLSS()
    Upload LSS Survey Files to the Database
    DB_send()
    Send a Table to the Database
    LS_Ask()
    Make a call to the LimeSurvey API
    LS_Connect()
    Connect with Limesurvey
    LS_DeleteSurvey()
    Delete a Survey from Lime Survey Instance
    LS_GetMasterData()
    Get the Master Data from Lime Survey
    LS_GetMasterQuestions()
    Get Questions from a Master File
    LS_GetMasterTemplates()
    Get Master Templates from Lime Survey
    LS_GetQlist()
    Superseded: Get the list of questions for a given survey ID
    LS_Release()
    Release a LimeSurvey API session key
    LS_SendSurvey()
    Send a Survey Template to Lime Survey
    LS_SendSurveys()
    Send Several Survey Templates to Lime Survey
    LS_UploadTemplates()
    Upload Master Templates as Survey Templates to Lime Survey
    LS_getQuestionsbyQID
    Superseded: Get Question Title, Plot Name, and Question Text by Question ID
    SwapLimesurveyTitles()
    Swap the Titles of the LimeSurvey Files (LLS)
    base64_to_df()
    Convert base64 encoded data to a data frame
    build()
    Build the Meta Data
    check_MasterTemplates()
    Check Master Templates
    check_SurveyTemplates()
    Check Survey Templates
    check_distinct()
    Check if All Variables of the Meta Data are Distinct
    check_manualmeta()
    Check the manual data
    connect_DB()
    Connect to the Database
    create_TestSchools()
    Create Test Schools
    create_config()
    Create a Config File
    extract_html()
    Extract Text from HTML formated Survey Text
    get_AllExtraPlots()
    Get Extra Plots for All Report Templates
    get_ExtraPlots()
    Get (extract) Extra Plots from the Manual Meta Data
    get_responses()
    Get responses (data) from LimeSurvey
    get_session_key()
    Get a LimeSurvey API session key
    is_html()
    Test if a Character Vector is actually HTML
    prepare_OverallReport()
    Build Overall Report based on Package Name
    prepare_RawMeta()
    Prepare the Raw Meta Data
    remove_and_combine()
    Remove White Spaces and Combine Text
    send_Report()
    Send Test Results
    workaround()
    Workaround (Soft depreciated)
